definition: outfit or suit (of clothes)/set of coordinated items/kit

to cover/to encase/cover/sheath/to overlap/to interleave/to model after/to copy/formula/harness/loop of rope/(fig.) to fish for/to obtain slyly/classifier for sets, collections/bend (of a river or mountain range, in place names)/tau (Greek letter Ττ)
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

sentences.english: Use Silky Skin Pouch-Removing Eye Protection Package in beauty parlor professional nursing.
sentences.chinese: 在美容院專業護理使用膚如凝脂消袋護眼套裝。

sentences.english: The coffret provides strong added value to personal care products.
sentences.chinese: 與套裝提供了強有力的附加價值，個人護理產品。

sentences.english: They look too contrived--and buying separates is much more affordable.
sentences.chinese: 因爲套裝看上去太做作，分開買更實惠些。

sentences.english: Use Flower Time Multiple-Purpose Eye Protection Package in beauty parlor professional nursing.
sentences.chinese: 美容院專業護理使用花樣年華多效護眼套裝。

sentences.english: She wore a fine, brightly-colored green suit and her appearance reminds people of the spring.
sentences.chinese: 她身穿別緻的綠色套裝，猶如春天般生氣盎然。

sentences.english: Dolce & Gabbana sent out a sultry ensemble of suits and lace dresses.
sentences.chinese: 而杜嘉班納產品主打性感套裝和蕾絲裙。

sentences.english: She was dressed in a severe blue suit that made her look almost military.
sentences.chinese: 深藍色西服套裝讓她看起來像是個軍人。

sentences.english: Angel Costume comes in a white mini dress with G-string.
sentences.chinese: 天使套裝包括白色小禮服和丁字褲。

sentences.english: Harmonious in colour and fashionaBle in style, this kind of suit is a Best seller.
sentences.chinese: 這種套裝，顏色調和，款式新穎，暢銷於市。

sentences.english: We're not going to apologize at all for nerfing an old set bonus.
sentences.chinese: 我們不打算爲削弱舊的套裝獎勵道歉。

sentences.english: All participants will be qualified to win this Guerlain kit.
sentences.chinese: 所有參與者都將有機會贏得女手袋嬌蘭套裝。

sentences.english: From Elvis-inspired jumpsuits to locks of celebrity hair, it's all out there, and it's all for sale.
sentences.chinese: 從貓王演出套裝到名人的頭髮，都在那裏，都有出售。

sentences.english: an eggshell-blue trouser suit with white sandals.
sentences.chinese: 穿着蛋殼藍套裝和白色涼鞋。

sentences.english: I swapped my New York attire for Aloha shirts.
sentences.chinese: 我把那些紐約套裝都換成了夏威夷襯衫。

sentences.english: BranD-name, pure-wool suit with its outstanDing features makes you appear esteemed and elegant.
sentences.chinese: 名牌純羊毛套裝，優點出衆，令您高貴典雅。

definition: ceremonial robe/formal attire (dinner suit, evening gown etc)
to belong or be dedicated exclusively to/proprietary/private/personal
custom-made/made-to-order/to have something custom made/also written 定製|定制
